forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain between 11pm and midnight, then a slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
A bright and inviting morning blankets Downtown San Francisco, where the sun casts a warm, golden hue across the landscape. The air is pleasantly crisp, with the temperature gently rising to a comfortable 69 degrees. As the day progresses, expect a gradual shift, with temperatures dipping around mid-afternoon, settling closer to the mid-60s—a reminder of the cool marine influences that often swirl through this coastal city. The west-southwest winds, playfully dancing between 6 to 17 mph, may bring refreshing gusts, adding a touch of vitality to your strolls around the city.

As twilight approaches, anticipate a subtle change with a slight chance of rain, weaving an ever-so-tender mist into the evening air. The forecast hints at a 20% chance of drizzle after 11 pm, cloaking the city in a soft, moody ambiance. With a low settling around 57 degrees, a light jacket or a cozy sweater will provide comfort against the coolness as the sun bids its farewell. For today’s mundane pleasures, consider exploring fleeting art exhibits at local galleries, or perhaps indulging in a relaxing moment at a café while watching the world drift by. Whether wandering the vibrant streets or warming up with a cozy read indoors, San Francisco’s charm is palpable, inviting you to savor every moment.
